title: Dinosaur National Monument: Get Involved
body: Explore This Park    Get Involved           Get Involved        A group of monument staff and volunteers poses for a photo at the end of a tamarisk removal trip. NPS   Â    Looking for how to get involved? Browse through the website navigation or use the search tool to find opportunities. NPS Centennial Find our what is going on with the Centennial of the National Park Service in 2016. Discover how Dinosaur National Monument is preparing for the next century of stewardship and unique experiences you can have.  Volunteer Volunteers play an important role in helping us both preserve the resources of Dinosaur National Monument and assisting visitors who come to see them. From campground hosts to visitor center staff to work projects, find out ways that you can volunteer. Donate Dinosaur National Monument accepts donations made directly to the monument. Public support is an essential element in the management of National Park Service lands. No other federal agency relies as heavily on the generosity and kindness of its visitors. Work With Us Find out about current job opportunities at Dinosaur National Monument including both permanent and seasonal positions.
